content.en_US:
A simple, early way of making power out of combustible fuels, like [[diesel|Diesel]] or [[gasoline|Gasoline]]. Can only hold 4,000mB of fuel, so explosive barrels cannot be emptied in them, as those carry 10,000mB. Can be stopped using a redstone signal.

See also:
[[Industrial Combustion Engine]]
[[Turbofan]]
[[Combined Cycle Gas Turbine]]
